description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE sits between the most expensive A-series handset and the entry-level flagship S-series model. At a price tag of Rs. 59,999, it competes against some really popular options. With a premium design, flagship processor, and faster charging, does the 'Fan Edition' offer enough to stand out among them? Here's our Samsung Galaxy S25 FE review.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Review: Near Flagship Experience

description: Apple could launch the foldable iPhone next year. Most recently, analyst Ming-Chi Kuo suggests that the foldable hinge might not be as expensive as previously expected. It could cost around $70 to $80 (roughly Rs. 7,000 to Rs. 8,000) per unit. Foxconn and Shin Zu Shing (SZS) have reportedly formed a joint venture to handle production of the foldable iPhone's hinge.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone to Feature a Hinge That Costs Less Than Previously Expected, Analyst Says

description: Ukrainian crypto investor and blogger Konstantin Galish, known as Kostya Kudo, was found dead in his Lamborghini in Kyiv. Authorities confirmed a gunshot wound and a weapon registered in his name, with police initiating a pre-trial investigation. The 32-year-old was a prominent figure in crypto education and trading, managing millions in investor funds and maintaining a strong social media presence. His death comes shortly after a steep global crypto market downturn.
title: Cryptology Key CEO Found Dead in Lamborghini in Ukraine Amidst Cryptocurrency Market Crash

description: Honor Magic 8 Pro will launch in China on October 15 and the Pro variant may come with a 6.71-inch 1.5K quad-curved display, 3D face recognition, a 3D ultrasonic fingerprint sensor, 120W wired charging support, as well as a 50-megapixel main and 50-megapixel ultrawide rear sensors. It is confirmed to get a 200-megapixel telephoto camera, a 7,200mAh battery with AI-backed voltage stabilisation and Android 16-based MagicOS 10.
title: Honor Magic 8 Pro Key Specifications Leaked Ahead of October 15 Launch in China

description: Windows 10 devices will stop receiving security updates starting October 14. Users might want to upgrade their laptops and PCs to the latest version of Windows 11, as there could be several undiscovered security vulnerabilities that could be exploited by bad actors once Microsoft stops providing support. While users can choose to opt for the Windows 10 Extended Security Updates (ESU) programme for receiving the security updates till next year, they will have to pay Microsoft to enroll for the same. On its website, the tech giant has listed multiple ways through which people can upgrade to Windows 11.
title: How to Update to Windows 11 Before Microsoft Ends Windows 10 Support on October 14: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: OnePlus Ace 6 was discovered on the China Compulsory Certification (CCC) website, otherwise known as 3C, ahead of its launch. The handset is expected to go official alongside the OnePlus 15 later this month. As per a tipster, it could be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The handset may have 50-megapixel + 8-megapixel dual rear cameras, and pack a 7,800mAh battery that supports 120W fast charging.
title: OnePlus Ace 6 Bags 3C Certification Ahead of China Launch; Key Specifications Leaked

description: Oppo Pad 5 is scheduled to launch soon globally. Ahead of its debut, the company has announced that the tablet will be offered in a new “Studying Purple” (translated from Chinese) colourway. Moreover, it is confirmed to sport a 3K resolution display and will be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset. The tablet has now been listed on the company website, revealing the storage options and colourways it will be sold in.
title: Oppo Pad 5 Storage Variants, Colourways Revealed via Listing on Company's Website

description: The Realme 15 Pro Game of Thrones Limited Edition checks all the right boxes as a special phone. It gets all the bells and whistles from HBO's iconic series, Game of Thrones, and truly is a delight for GOT fans. It comes in a single 12GB RAM and 512GB storage model priced at under Rs. 45,000. It offers decent everyday performance, and the primary camera is great. The battery sets a benchmark for other phones in this price segment. However, bloatware is still part of the package, which is slightly disappointing. Here's our full review.
title: Realme 15 Pro Game of Thrones Limited Edition Review: A Device Worthy of the Iron Throne?

description: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G goes on sale in India. The new phone runs on the Exynos 1330 chipset and has a triple rear camera unit, led by a 50-megapixel primary shooter. It flaunts a 6.7-inch display and has an IP54-rated build for dust and splash resistance. It has a 5,000mAh battery with 25W wired fast charging support. It is available for purchase via the Samsung India website and Amazon.
title: Samsung Galaxy M17 5G With 5,000mAh Battery Goes on Sale in India: Price, Features, Sale Offers

description: The Singapore High Court has approved WazirX’s revised restructuring plan following the $234 million hack in 2024. The ruling enables the exchange to restart operations and repay over 150,000 users through recovery tokens. The hack, traced to North Korea’s Lazarus Group, forced a halt in withdrawals. The decision marks a key step toward restoring market confidence and platform activity.
title: Singapore Court Approves WazirX Restructuring Plan Following $234 Million Hack

description: Vivo Pad 5e was launched in China on Monday as the new entrant in the company’s Pad 5 lineup. The launch event also marked the arrival of the Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro, Watch GT 2, and TWS 5. The company recently unveiled the Vivo Pad 5 series, along with its budget offering, dubbed Pad SE. It is powered by a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset and sports a 12.1-inch screen. On the back, it sports a circular rear camera module. The Pad 5e is offered in purple, black, and blue colourways.
title: Vivo Pad 5e Launched With 12.1-Inch Display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 Chipset: Price, Specifications

description: Vivo TWS 5 earphones were launched in China on Monday. They were launched alongside the Vivo X300 series. The standard Vivo TWS 5 launched in Simple White, Pure Black and Smokey Purple colour options, while the TWS 5 Hi-Fi variant is offered in Sea Blue and White colours. They offer a 42ms latency rate
title: Vivo TWS 5 Series Launched With Hi-Res Audio, Up to 12 Hours of Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Vivo Watch GT 2 launched in China alongside the X300 series, Vivo TWS 5, and Vivo Pad 5e. It features a 2.07-inch rectangular display with a 60Hz refresh rate and 2,400 nits brightness, running on Blue River OS 3.0. Priced at CNY 499 (roughly Rs. 6,200) for Bluetooth and CNY 699 (roughly Rs. 8,700) for the eSIM variant, it offers up to 33 and 28 days of claimed battery life, respectively.
title: Vivo Watch GT 2 Launched With 2.07-Inch Screen, eSIM Support: Price, Features

description: Vivo has launched the X300 series in China, featuring the X300 and X300 Pro. Both run on MediaTek’s Dimensity 9500 chipset with Android 16-based OriginOS 6 and include Zeiss-backed cameras with the V3+ imaging chip. The X300 has a 200-megapixel Samsung HPB main sensor, while the X300 Pro uses a 50-megapixel Sony LYT-828 sensor. Both phones feature 50-megapixel front cameras and BOE Q10+ OLED 1.5K LTPO displays, with the Pro offering a larger screen. They house 6,040mAh and 6,510mAh batteries, respectively.
title: Vivo X300 Pro Launched With MediaTek Dimensity 9500 SoC Alongside Vivo X300: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp is reportedly testing a sidebar for the iPad app version. WhatsApp is reportedly rolling out the feature via the TestFlight beta Programme, with the WhatsApp beta for iOS 25.29.10.72. Beta testers cannot access the feature, as it is still in development, but it may be rolled out to testers with a future update . The feature could make navigation smoother. It could also allow users to access Chats, Calls, Communities, and Settings quickly.
title: WhatsApp Could Offer Improved Navigation on iPad With Left-Aligned Sidebar

description: OnePlus 15 is scheduled to launch in China this month. The upcoming flagship phone was recently showcased in India during the Snapdragon Summit Global Highlights, confirming its debut in the country. Several specifications and features of the handset have been teased by the Chinese smartphone maker so far, including that it will be equipped with a 165Hz refresh rate display. Now, the tech firm has announced that the phone will sport a third-generation BOE Flexible OLED display. BOE has announced that it will unveil its new screen on October 14.
title: OnePlus 15 Key Display Features Teased; BOE Set to Unveil New Smartphone Screen on October 14

description: After sliding sharply on the weekend following US tariff news, the crypto market is rebounding as trade tensions show signs of easing. Bitcoin trades above $114,000 (roughly Rs. 1.01 crore), while Ethereum has reclaimed the $4,100 (roughly Rs. 3.64 lakh) mark. Analysts believe that the recovery signals investor confidence returning, aided by short liquidations and renewed institutional inflows.
title: Bitcoin Price Slips to $114,800 as US Tariff Shock Triggers Crypto Market Reset

description: Motorola has announced festive discounts on smartphones, tablets, TWS earbuds, and smart TVs. Handsets such as Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Edge 60 Fusion, Moto G86 Power, and more, can be purchased with lucrative discounts during the Flipkart Diwali sale. Further, offers on TWS earbuds, QLED TVs, and Mini LED TVs will be live during the second phase of the Flipkart Big Bang Diwali Sale.
title: Flipkart Diwali Sale 2025: Motorola Edge 60 Pro, Moto Razr 60 and More Go on Sale at Discounted Prices

description: Oppo has unveiled the Hasselblad Professional Imaging Kit for the Find X9 Pro ahead of its launch in China. It is a set of magenticallly-attachable accessories that aim to enhance its zooming capabilities. As per the company, the imaging kit includes Hasselblad-branded teleconverter, a magnetic flashing ring light, a magnetic handle, a magnetic protective case, and a professional shoulder strap. These accessories are exclusive to the Oppo Find X9 Pro and will not be available for the standard variant.
title: Oppo Unveils Find X9 Pro’s Hasselblad Professional Imaging Kit Ahead of Launch

description: Reflect Orbital recently filed an application with the US FCC Space Bureau seeking permission to test launch its Earendil-1 non-geostationary orbit satellite. With this, the startup plans to begin redirecting the light emitted by the Sun with the help of glass-like satellites to dimly lit parts of the Earth. After closing its Series A round earlier this year, the company said that it has received over 2.6 lakh applications for “satellite-reflected sunlight” from 157 countries. While the application of the technology might be new, it comes with its own set of problems, like Space and Light Pollution.
title: Reflect Orbital Plans to Light Up Parts of Earth Where Sunlight Does Not Reach by April 2026

description: Samsung W26, exclusive to China, is based on the Galaxy Z Fold 7 but adds key differences. It retains the 8-inch foldable display, 6.5-inch cover screen, Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset, and 200-megapixel triple rear camera setup. It also offers 5G, Wi-Fi 7, and Bluetooth 5.4, alongside a 4,400mAh battery, Armor Aluminum frame, and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.  Unlike the Fold 7, the W26 supports direct satellite connectivity via China’s Tiantong system for emergency calls and messaging.
title: Samsung W26 Launched With 8-Inch Main Display, 200-Megapixel Primary Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra could launch early next year. Ahead of the formal release, the flagship phone has allegedly passed Radio Certification in China. The listing suggests Tiantong-1 and Beidou connectivity for satellite calls and messages. It could also offer UWB (Ultra-Wideband) support. The Xiaomi 17 Ultra is said to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, like its siblings. It could pack a quad rear camera unit.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Receives Regulatory Approval for Direct Satellite Connectivity, Tipster Claims

description: Amazon is running the Diwali special Amazon Great Indian Festival 2025 this week to offer discounts and deals on a range of products. Among other items, the ongoing sale brings attractive offers on Samsung smartphones. The online marketplace is also giving bank discounts and exchange offers on phones to give customers. There are no-cost EMI options on select bank cards.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy A55 and More Samsung Smartphones Available With Massive Discounts

description: Apple is reportedly developing the next-generation AirPods Pro, expected to feature the new H3 chip for improved sound and lower latency. A version of the AirPods Pro 3 with integrated IR cameras may also debut next year, potentially using the H3 chip, though it’s unclear if it will retain the “Pro 3” branding or launch as AirPods Pro 4. Apple is also working on AirPods 5, likely adding health sensors like temperature monitoring and enhanced AI features, but not a heart-rate sensor.
title: Apple Reportedly Developing New AirPods Pro, AirPods 5 and Next-Gen H3 Chip

description: Apple is gearing up to refresh its other product categories following the iPhone 17 series debut. The Cupertino-based tech giant could introduce three new products as soon as this week, as per a journalist. Among the expected announcements may be a new 14-inch MacBook Pro powered by an M5 chipset. The same processor is also reported to make its way to the upcoming iPad Pro. Meanwhile, an updated version of the Apple Vision Pro is also said to be on the cards, although it will be more of an incremental upgrade than a true successor.
title: Apple to Reportedly Launch 14-inch MacBook Pro, M5 iPad Pro and Updated Vision Pro ‘This Week’
Still Ignoring That Windows 11 Upgrade? You Might Be Ignoring Future

description: Vivo X300 series is scheduled to be launched in China today (October 13). We can expect two models to be launched --- Vivo X300 and X300 Pro. In recent weeks, the company has revealed several details about the upcoming handsets, while leaks have also given us a fair idea of what to expect in terms of features. Here's all you need to know about the Vivo X300 and Vivo X300 Pro, including their price, expected features and specifications ahead of their launch today.
title: Vivo X300 and X300 Pro Launch Today: Expected Price, Specifications, Zeiss Camera Details and More
